metadata.synopsis: Cal is fighting the people who once hosted them in the grove. He'll do it to protect the tieflings but he hates it - he would much prefer a peaceful resolution.

0.speaker: Cal
0.text: Damn it. How many are there?
0.context: NodeContext: In the middle of the fight - grim and determined.

1.speaker: Cal
1.text: More blood and death. Don't know about you, but I'll never get used to it.
1.context: NodeContext: Sighing and frustrated, You're glad the tieflings survived but you hate that it was at the cost of other lives.
